channel.title: [C4D] Bathroom
channel.description:
Im not copying STH, he just gives me ideas, so i tried a bathroom. It looks pretty decent and not something i just 'threw' together, i worked more on each model more than i usually do, the door still needs ALOT of work. But so far i need some CC.
Im lovin' the toilet paper though.
[img]http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/741/bathroombe4.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/1331/bath2cc6.png[/img]

item.title: [C4D] Bathroom
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Yea. I want the room to look a bit more real, the colors are to bright and ‘dreamy’ like to make it seem real.

Read full topic

Your handles are just cylinders. Those are kinda like Xs. And the faucet is way less curved.

item.title: [C4D] Bathroom
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:19, topic:235584”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=310678.msg2481128#msg2481128 date=1223542685]

That sink and faucet need to be fixed next. Along with all the handles.

handles never were finished, i wanted it to look decently real then go in and make those look great. And more work on the faucet? Like what?

…
That one just doesn’t look like one at all.
[/quote]

Actually, many faucets look like that.[/quote]
From a design perspective NO.
Not very functional. If you can find me a faucet that looks like that I will send you money via paypal.

Wayy too high. And all it is is a circle on a sweeps nurb. No change in shape whatsoever.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Bathroom
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I think the problem with your bathroom is it’s so primitive. I can tell how you made everything and I could do it as well. The door and counter both just look like a box. And all the handles look like cylinders and spheres. Everything else is self explanatory.

Mine, on the other hand, yes it’s primitive. But I mean that in the way that it was made using all primitives. They’re not primitives anymore. But they were. Yours kinda looks like mine before I did any work to it.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Bathroom
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:11, topic:235584”][quote author=Frell link=topic=310678.msg2480691#msg2480691 date=1223511225]

STH should only give you inspirations on what to make, not direct ideas… But uhm, the texture on the toilet paper sure is cool lul

He inspires me to try ideas he has tackled. I am very lost half the time thinking about what to practice modeling on. I want to try to make simple realistic objects rather than a full room but i cant think of anything.
[/quote]

That’s exactly the problem I face and is almost 80% directly related to why I don’t always have something I’m working on.
But I get ideas from looking around. Seeing things. Honestly just about anything I look at I wonder how to make it. What I would do. So even if I’m not modeling, I’m gaining experience.

But sometimes like this when I get really creative, I have a few ideas and never get to do them all.[/quote]
I look at some things and wonder how i would make the shape, like when im in the dentists office im looking at the TV or im in the lobby looking at stuff. But i usually dont like making rooms because i set up lighting and everything first, then model, instead of the other way around.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Bathroom

[quote=“Frell, post:10, topic:235584”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=310678.msg2480677#msg2480677 date=1223510821]
STH should only give you inspirations on what to make, not direct ideas… But uhm, the texture on the toilet paper sure is cool lul
[/quote]
He inspires me to try ideas he has tackled. I am very lost half the time thinking about what to practice modeling on. I want to try to make simple realistic objects rather than a full room but i cant think of anything.[/quote]

That’s exactly the problem I face and is almost 80% directly related to why I don’t always have something I’m working on.
But I get ideas from looking around. Seeing things. Honestly just about anything I look at I wonder how to make it. What I would do. So even if I’m not modeling, I’m gaining experience.

But sometimes like this when I get really creative, I have a few ideas and never get to do them all.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Bathroom
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Unhandled:

Do you just take a shit on the floor at your house, or will you add a toilet?

Not on the floor, but in the purple bucket. Lol, didnt get to the crapper yet.

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:4, topic:235584”][quote author=Frell link=topic=310678.msg2479178#msg2479178 date=1223426267]

be original please

wucha mean? Thats what my bathroom looks like
[/quote]

Lol NO it is not.
But it kinda does look thrown together.
The toilet paper is the size of the sink.[/quote]
Actually my bathroom is spaced out like that, a bit less, and i didnt notice the toilet paper thing 0o looks like a napkin roll.

Ill probably have this removed, i feel like im trying to give you competition or something (lol?) Or like i am copying everything you do.

Ill just work on it a bit more and implement some common sense ;).

Also its very hard for me to get into small things because my C4D is meant for XP, and i have it on Vista, so when i get close to textures and light everything gets distorted.

Read full topic
